full_text: Baal ines IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2020/KERI774 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON WEDNESDAY, THE 08TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 18TH POUSHA, 1941 Crl.MC.No.6910 OF 2019(C) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 1147/2017 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS-I,MANJERI CRIME NO.107/2017 OF KARIPUR POLICE STATION, Malappuram PETITIONERS /ACCUSED : 1 VEERAN KUTTY, AGED 24 YEARS S/O.MOITHEEN KUTTY, ALUMKUZHIYATTIL HOUSE, THARAYITTAL, KARIPPUR.P.O. 2 HARRIS, AGED 25 YEARS S/O.MOHAMMED, CHULLIYAN HOUSE, CHIRAYIL.P.O. 3 MOHAMMED SUHAIL, AGED 22 YEARS S/O.MOHAMMED, CHALIKANICHIRI HOUSE, CHERALAPPALAM, KARIPPUR.P.O. BY ADVS. SRI.S.RAJEEV SRI.K.K.DHEERENDRAKRISHNAN SRI.V.VINAY SRI.D.FEROZE SRI.K.ANAND (A-1921) RESPONDENTS/STATE & DEFACTO COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA, REP. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM- 682031. (CRIME NO.107/2017 OF KARIPPUR POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT) 2 MOHAMMED ASIF ALI V.K., AGED 28 YEARS, S/O.BEERAN KUTTY, VELLAKKADAN HOUSE, PERUVALLUR.P.O., MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-673638. R2 BY ADV. VINOD KUMAR.C OTHER PRESENT: SRI.B.JAYASURYA SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: 2 2020/KER/774 Crl.MC 6910/2019 -2- ORDER Dated this the 8th day of January 2020 Petitioners are accused in CC No.1147/2017 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court- I, Manjeri for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 341, 323, 427, 294(b) read with Section 34 IPC. 2. The defacto complainant is the second respondent. He has appeared through counsel and filed affidavit to the effect that the matter has been amicably settled with the petitioners and that he has no grievance against them. A report to that effect has also been obtained from the investigating officer through the learned Senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioners do not have any criminal antecedents. No public interest is involved. In the result, the Criminal M.c. is allowed and the entire proceedings as against the petitioners herein in CC No.1147/2017 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-I, Manjeri shall stand Bier . c El a B 2020/KER/774 Crl.MC 6910/2019 -3- quashed under Section 482 Ccr.PC and the petitioners/accused are discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE Ig Baal ines 2020/KER/774 Cr1l.MC 6910/2019 -4- APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE I CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO.107/2017 OF KARIPPUR POLICE STATION PRESENTLY CC.NO.1147/17 ON THE FILE OF THE JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS-I, MANJERI. ANNEXURE II AFFIDAVIT DATED 2.10.2019 SWORN BY THE SECOND RESPONDENT.
